actions.text: On agreeing to the Rohrabacher amendment (A017) Agreed to by recorded vote: 215 - 206 (Roll no. 230).
Mr. Dellums demanded a separate vote on the Rohrabacher amendment (A017).
On agreeing to the Rohrabacher amendment (A017) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 204 - 219 (Roll no. 235).

description: Amendment prohibits Cooperative Threat Reduction funds from being provided to Russia if Russia transfers an SS-N-22 missile system to the People's Republic of China.
purpose: An amendment to deny any of the Nunn-Lugar aid funds in the bill to Russia if Russia transfers an SST-N-22 missile system to the People's Republic of China.
